name: SidaProj
sql:
CREATE TABLE [SidaProj] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Project] VARCHAR(35)  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL
)

name: Contact
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Contact] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Name] VARCHAR(70)  NULL,
[ContactName] VARCHAR(70)  NULL,
[Email] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Co] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Address] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[Zip] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[ZipTown] VARCHAR(40)  NULL,
[Tel] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[BankGiro] VARCHAR(15)  NULL,
[PostGiro] VARCHAR(15)  NULL,
[Code] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: OCRImportRows
sql:
CREATE TABLE [OCRImportRows] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[ImportId] INTEGER  NULL,
[Kundreferens] VARCHAR(30)  NULL,
[Belopp] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[Reserv1] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[Avsandarkonto] VARCHAR(5)  NULL,
[PlusGiroJournalNr] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[Filmnummer] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[Komplettering] VARCHAR(1)  NULL,
[Reserv2] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[GiverId] INTEGER  NULL,
[Belopp2] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[Belopp3] NUMERIC  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[StatusMessage] VARCHAR(255)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: User
sql:
CREATE TABLE [User] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Username] VARCHAR(35)  NULL,
[Password] VARCHAR(100)  NULL,
[FirstName] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[LastName] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[Permissions] VARCHAR(200)  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[LastLogin] TIMESTAMP  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: Payment
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Payment] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Date] DATE  NULL,
[GiverId] INTEGER  NULL,
[PaymentType] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[PaymentTypeId] INTEGER  NULL,
[ProjectId] INTEGER  NULL,
[InKr] NUMERIC  NULL,
[OutKr] NUMERIC  NULL,
[AddedBy] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[AddedByUserId] INTEGER  NULL,
[PaymentSource] VARCHAR(15)  NULL,
[PaymentSourceId] INTEGER  NULL,
[AdminCharge] NUMERIC  NULL,
[AdminPercent] INTEGER  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL,
[InKrTotal] NUMERIC  NULL
)

name: Database
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Database] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Name] VARCHAR(30)  NULL,
[Type] VARCHAR(2)  NULL
)

name: OCRImport
sql:
CREATE TABLE [OCRImport] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Date] DATE  NULL,
[AccountNr] VARCHAR(8)  NULL,
[AccountName] VARCHAR(30)  NULL,
[FName] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[Src] TEXT  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[Total] NUMERIC  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL,
[Rows] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: Caravan
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Caravan] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Nr] INTEGER  NULL,
[Regnr] VARCHAR(15)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[Make] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[OwnerName] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[OwnerAddress] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[OwnerPostCode] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[OwnerPostTown] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[Tel] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[Price] NUMERIC  NULL,
[Equipment] TEXT  NULL,
[Location] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[HiredBy] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[GivNr] INTEGER  NULL,
[ConfirmDate] DATE  NULL,
[Year] VARCHAR(8)  NULL,
[TotalPrice] NUMERIC  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(15)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: action
sql:
CREATE TABLE [action] (
[id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[actionName] VARCHAR(80)  NULL,
[entityName] VARCHAR(30)  NULL,
[entityId] INTEGER  NULL,
[date] TIMESTAMP  NULL,
[notes] TEXT  NULL
)

name: Cassette
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Cassette] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Nr] VARCHAR(8)  NULL,
[Speaker] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Subject] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Extra] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Date] DATE  NULL,
[Tags] VARCHAR(120)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: Church
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Church] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[ChurchName] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[Address] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[Zip] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[ZipTown] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[Tel] VARCHAR(33)  NULL,
[Contact] VARCHAR(30)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[coAddress] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Email] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Url] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Tags] VARCHAR(120)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: Company
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Company] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[CompanyName] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[Address] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[Zip] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[ZipTown] VARCHAR(40)  NULL,
[Tel] VARCHAR(20)  NULL,
[BankGiro] VARCHAR(15)  NULL,
[PostGiro] VARCHAR(15)  NULL,
[Code] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Tags] VARCHAR(120)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: Project
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Project] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(15)  NULL,
[Project] VARCHAR(35)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[FinanceCode] VARCHAR(15)  NULL,
[AdminPercent] NUMERIC  NULL,
[Tags] VARCHAR(120)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: SocialWorker
sql:
CREATE TABLE [SocialWorker] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Name] VARCHAR(255)  NULL,
[LastName] VARCHAR(150)  NULL,
[Address] VARCHAR(250)  NULL,
[ZipCode] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[ZipTown] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[Land] VARCHAR(4)  NULL,
[Tel] VARCHAR(12)  NULL,
[Mob] VARCHAR(12)  NULL,
[Email] VARCHAR(100)  NULL,
[StartD] DATE  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[CoAddress] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL,
[Tags] VARCHAR(120)  NULL
)

name: Betel
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Betel] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Name] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[LastName] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[Address] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[coAddress] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Zip] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[ZipTown] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[CountryCode] VARCHAR(4)  NULL,
[ProjectCode] VARCHAR(10)  NULL,
[DOB] VARCHAR(14)  NULL,
[BapDT] DATE  NULL,
[Tel] VARCHAR(10)  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[mobile] VARCHAR(24)  NULL,
[email] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Tags] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL,
[Paper] BOOLEAN  NULL
)

name: CustomReport
sql:
CREATE TABLE [CustomReport] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Name] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[Type] VARCHAR(15)  NULL,
[Data] TEXT  NULL,
[Query] TEXT  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Display] VARCHAR(50)  NULL
)

name: SocialWorkArea
sql:
CREATE TABLE [SocialWorkArea] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[CountryCode] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Area] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Area1] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[SocialWorkerId] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: Fadderbarn
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Fadderbarn] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Nbr] INTEGER  NULL,
[Name] VARCHAR(140)  NULL,
[FathersName] VARCHAR(120)  NULL,
[MothersName] VARCHAR(140)  NULL,
[DOB] VARCHAR(16)  NULL,
[GiverId] INTEGER  NULL,
[HelpD] DATE  NULL,
[Mkr] NUMERIC  NULL,
[Area1] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[Area] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[TGdt] DATE  NULL,
[CountryCode] VARCHAR(4)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[Photo1] DATE  NULL,
[Photo2] DATE  NULL,
[OwnNotes] TEXT  NULL,
[Helper] VARCHAR(140)  NULL,
[RepThis] DATE  NULL,
[RepOld] DATE  NULL,
[RepLast] DATE  NULL,
[RepAllm] DATE  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Guardian] VARCHAR(70)  NULL,
[RegDate] DATE  NULL,
[SWId] INTEGER  NULL,
[ProjectId] INTEGER  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL,
[Tags] VARCHAR(120)  NULL
)

name: barnNbrs
sql:
CREATE TABLE [barnNbrs] (
[Id] INTEGER  NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
[Nbr] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: GivProj
sql:
CREATE TABLE [GivProj] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[GiverId] INTEGER  NULL,
[StartDt] DATE  NULL,
[KrMon] NUMERIC  NULL,
[ProjectId] INTEGER  NULL,
[LastPayment] DATE  NULL,
[LastPaymentTot] NUMERIC  NULL,
[PaidTot] NUMERIC  NULL,
[OneTimePromise] NUMERIC  NULL,
[OneTimePromisePaid] BOOLEAN DEFAULT '0' NULL,
[LastYearSi] NUMERIC  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: evangelistNbrs
sql:
CREATE TABLE [evangelistNbrs] (
[Id] INTEGER  NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
[Nbr] INTEGER  NULL
)

name: Evangelist
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Evangelist] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Nbr] INTEGER  NULL,
[Name] VARCHAR(140)  NULL,
[DOB] VARCHAR(16)  NULL,
[GiverId] INTEGER  NULL,
[HelpD] DATE  NULL,
[Mkr] NUMERIC  NULL,
[Area1] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[Area] VARCHAR(60)  NULL,
[TGdt] DATE  NULL,
[RegDate] DATE  NULL,
[CountryCode] VARCHAR(4)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL,
[ProjectId] INTEGER  NULL,
[Tags] VARCHAR(120)  NULL
)

name: Giver
sql:
CREATE TABLE [Giver] (
[Id] INTEGER  PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
[Name] VARCHAR(255)  NULL,
[Address] VARCHAR(250)  NULL,
[ZipCode] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[ZipTown] VARCHAR(50)  NULL,
[Nr] INTEGER  NULL,
[Land] VARCHAR(4)  NULL,
[Tel] VARCHAR(12)  NULL,
[Mob] VARCHAR(12)  NULL,
[Email] VARCHAR(100)  NULL,
[Paper] BOOLEAN  NULL,
[Member] BOOLEAN  NULL,
[StartD] DATE  NULL,
[ProjCode] VARCHAR(34)  NULL,
[Status] VARCHAR(25)  NULL,
[Notes] TEXT  NULL,
[CoAddress] VARCHAR(90)  NULL,
[LastName] VARCHAR(150)  NULL,
[PersonNbr] VARCHAR(14)  NULL,
[Letter] BOOLEAN  NULL,
[Tags] VARCHAR(120)  NULL,
[Db] INTEGER  NULL
)
